    • Method Detail

      • initializeClaw

        public void initializeClaw()
        Initializes the claws. First method that should be called when using the claws. To be used effectively, the claws should start at the top and be in a closed position,

      • lift

        public void lift()
        Lifts block. Only call when the robot is at the appropriate distance (block should be between the claws before this method is called).

      • releaseTower

        public void releaseTower()
        Safely releases the tower on the ground.
        [WARNING] only call when robot is in the safe zone.

      • computePulleyTurnAngle

        public double computePulleyTurnAngle(double distanceToRotate)
        computes angle by which the pulleyMotor should rotate to lift the claws by distanceToRotate

      • getCounter

        public int getCounter()
        Gets the amount of blocks held by the robot.
